name: Nebius
description: Nebius AI Cloud is a vertically integrated GPU cloud with published H100/H200/L40S rates, HGX cluster SKUs, and commitment discounts up to 35%.

features.title: Transparent GPU pricing
features.description: Published on-demand rates for H100 and H200 plus L40S options

features.title: Commitment discounts
features.description: Long-term commitments can cut on-demand rates by up to 35%

features.title: HGX clusters
features.description: Multi-GPU HGX B200/H200/H100 nodes with per-GPU table pricing

features.title: Self-service console
features.description: Launch and manage AI Cloud resources directly from the Nebius console

features.title: Docs-first platform
features.description: Comprehensive documentation across compute, networking, and data services

pros: Transparent published hourly GPU pricing for H100/H200/L40S with commitment discounts available
HGX B200/H200/H100 options for dense multi-GPU training
Self-service console plus contact-sales for larger commitments
Vertical integration aimed at predictable pricing and performance
cons: Regional availability is not fully enumerated on public pages
Blackwell pre-orders and large HGX capacity require sales engagement
Pricing for ancillary services (storage/network) is less visible than GPU rates

gettingStarted.title: Create an account
gettingStarted.description: Sign up and log in to the Nebius AI Cloud console.

gettingStarted.title: Add billing or credits
gettingStarted.description: Attach a payment method to unlock on-demand GPU access.

gettingStarted.title: Pick a GPU SKU
gettingStarted.description: Choose H100, H200, L40S, or an HGX cluster size from the pricing catalog.

gettingStarted.title: Launch and connect
gettingStarted.description: Provision a VM or cluster and connect via SSH or your preferred tooling.

gettingStarted.title: Optimize costs
gettingStarted.description: Apply commitment discounts or talk to sales for large reservations.

computeServices.name: AI Cloud GPU Instances
computeServices.description: On-demand GPU VMs with published hourly rates and commitment discounts.

instanceTypes.name: NVIDIA H200 GPU
instanceTypes.description: 141 GB HBM H200 GPUs for memory-intensive training and inference.
features: Up to 35% savings with long-term commitments

instanceTypes.name: NVIDIA H100 GPU
instanceTypes.description: 80 GB HBM H100 GPUs for general-purpose training and low-latency inference.

computeServices.name: HGX Clusters
computeServices.description: Dense multi-GPU HGX nodes for large-scale training.

instanceTypes.name: HGX B200
instanceTypes.description: 16x NVIDIA B200 (200 GB) nodes for next-gen training.
features: Latest Blackwell architecture for frontier-scale workloads
Available through contact-sales for capacity planning

instanceTypes.name: HGX H200
instanceTypes.description: 16x NVIDIA H200 HGX nodes with high-bandwidth memory.
features: Suited for long-context LLMs and memory-bound training

instanceTypes.name: HGX H100
instanceTypes.description: 16x NVIDIA H100 HGX nodes for Hopper-scale training.

gpuServices.name: GPU Catalog
gpuServices.description: Flagship NVIDIA accelerators available on-demand and via reservations.

types.name: H200
types.bestFor: High-memory training and inference with large context windows

types.name: L40S
types.bestFor: Cost-efficient inference, graphics, and video workloads

types.name: HGX B200 (pre-order)
types.bestFor: Next-generation Blackwell training on multi-GPU nodes

pricingOptions.name: On-demand GPU pricing
pricingOptions.description: Published transparent hourly rates for H200, H100, and L40S GPUs with self-service console access.

pricingOptions.name: HGX cluster pricing
pricingOptions.description: Published per-GPU-hour pricing for HGX B200, HGX H200, and HGX H100 multi-GPU nodes.

pricingOptions.name: Commitment discounts
pricingOptions.description: Save up to 35% versus on-demand with long-term commitments and larger GPU quantities.

pricingOptions.name: Blackwell pre-order
pricingOptions.description: Pre-order NVIDIA Blackwell platforms through the sales contact form.

regions: GPU clusters deployed across Europe and the US; headquarters in Amsterdam with engineering hubs in Finland, Serbia, and Israel (per About page).
support: Documentation at docs.nebius.com, self-service AI Cloud console, and contact-sales for capacity or commitments.
uniqueSellingPoints: Vertically integrated AI cloud with transparent flagship GPU pricing
Commitment discounts up to 35% plus HGX B200/H200/H100 cluster options
Blackwell pre-orders alongside on-demand H100/H200/L40S availability
